newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS- Niugini says in talks with Battle.
newsitem.headline: RTRS- Niugini says in talks with Battle.

text.p: Niugini Mining Ltd said on Thursday Battle Mountain Gold Co has initiated talks about acquiring the shares in Niugini it does not already own.
Battle Mountain owns 50.4 percent of Niugini.

"The talks started earlier this week," Jeff Quartermaine, general manager of corporate and finance of Niugini told Reuters Quartermaine said it was too early to speculate on the outcome of the discussions.
Niugini holds copper and gold mining interests in Australia, Chile and Papua new Guinea, where it has a 17.2 percent stake in the Lihir gold project.

There has been speculation that U.S.-based Battle Mountain would either look to take full control of Niugini or dispose of its shareholding following Battle Mountain's merger with Hemlo Mining Inc of Canada.
